text: Juda binɨb okok mɨdupsek nepal, yad bɨ ke okok nɨb mel, bɨ Pelisi olap agak. Bɨ Pelisi okok, takaw adek keke mɨdɨl kɨdek gep tek mel ak pen, yad takaw anɨb okok mɨdupsek nɨŋɨd, asɨk tep yɨbɨl gɨpin agak. Ñɨsɨkol mug tɨkɨl, mɨd dad apɨl, mɨñɨl mɨdebin ñɨn awl, Juda binɨb taun Tasus nɨb, Jelusalem nɨb yad kɨli ayɨp mɨdebin agak. Anɨb ak yɨp Pelisi agɨl nepal ak pen, takaw anɨb ak we gɨl, yɨp kot gebal agak.
